contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 28, 2015 D Wessex BBA Contest
Wessex BBA Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Wessex Brass Band Association wessex-brass-band-association-contest
Life Centre, Bournemouth, Dorset, England, UK Best Championship Section: Medway Best 1st Section: Verwood Concert Brass Best 2nd Section: Andover Town Best 3rd Section: Gillingham (announced as Corsham on the day due to error, but later revised by WBBA) Best 4th Section: Verwood Town
Best March (A Section): Medway Best March (B Section): Bath Spa
Best Instrumentalist (Bolton Plaque): Principal Cornet, Verwood Concert Brass, Elaine Close Best Euphonium (Gomersal Cup): Medway Best Cornet, Sections 2-4 (Woods Cup): Andover Town, Adrian Wallace Best Trombone Section (Willis Cup): Andover Town Best Percussion Section (Winter Cup): Verwood Concert Brass Best Bass Section (Spencer Shield): Michelmersh Silver
Conductor with best musical interpretation (South Wilts Cup): Melvin White, Medway
Oct. 4, 2015, 2:02 p.m. Nov. 30, 2015, 5:24 p.m.
1 Verwood Concert Brass Kevin Smith Dances and Arias
2 Medway Band Melvin White Elgar Variations
3 Hyde Band Jonathan Lush-Camps Four Dances from Checkmate
4 Sandhurst Silver Andrew Porter Paganini Variations
5 Andover Town Steve Large The Plantagenets
6 Poole Borough Band Chris Davis Egmont [arr. Ball]
7 Swindon Pegasus Brass David Mace Penlee
8 New Forest Brass Ian Luxford The Graces of Love
9 Michelmersh Silver Band Dave Barringer The Essence of Time
10 Bournemouth Concert Brass David Hayward Diversions on a Bass Theme
11 Gillingham Imperial Silver Band Jim Bennett Prometheus Unbound
12 Corsham Band Colin Hogg Triptych [Sparke]
13 A. W. Parker (Drybrook) Band Joshua Ruck Trittico
14 Verwood Town Emma Button The Haslemere Suite
15 City of Bath Martin Perry The Present Age
16 Swindon Brass Fran Cowley Evolution - Five States of Change
17 Spinnaker Brass Mike Pennicote-Henrie A Little Light Music
18 Midsomer Norton and Radstock Silver Joanne Sykes Promenade
Withdrawn Ocean Brass Unknown
